data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 29471, Version Hash: d79439b5bb00ea59889161eea97862d72e49f16b
data.actual_result: The name remains dim and the 'clicker' pointer remains instead of the finger/select pointer.
data.expected_result: The finger/select pointer should appear once the profile is closed to show it is an option. The name remains dim.
data.short_description: 'Select' pointer does not appear after closing a discord profile from a voice chat.
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click a user in a voice chat - Select Profile - Whilst the profile is open, hover over another (or the same) person in the voice chat list - left click to close profile - finger/select pointer will not appear until you move to another name.
